methods.name: void onConversationUpdate(@NonNull ConversationChannel conversation)
methods.comment:
* Triggers when the conversation registered for a listener has been updated. * * @param conversation The conversation with modified data * @see IPeopleManager#registerConversationListener(String, int, String, * android.app.people.ConversationListener) * *

Only system root and SysUI have access to register the listener.
